participant_1.background:
I sometimes struggle to find clothes that fit my body type.
i had one step dad , and fortunately he ignored me.
I've been single for a while now, but I'm looking forward to finding someone to share my life with.
I am resilient and intelligent, thanks to my mom and my love for reading.
i volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.

participant_2.background:
I'm excited to drive my new car in any weather!
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
I'm a writer who enjoys spending time with my dog.
I love playing guitar but sometimes I spend too much time practicing and not enough time with my family.
I run every morning before work to clear my head and relieve stress.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
It's going well, thanks for asking! Just got back from volunteering at my son's boy scout troop.
Oh that's really cool! I love volunteering, it's so rewarding. I volunteer at my local animal shelter.
That's awesome! I love animals, especially dogs. I have a golden retriever named Charlie.
I love dogs too! I have a golden retriever mix named Bailey.
Oh that's great! Golden retrievers are the best dogs.
They are! I love their sweet personalities.
Me too! I'm glad we met!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who loves animals.
Yeah, it is! I hope we can chat again sometime.
Me too! Have a great day!
